name: 洪子逸
objective: 本課程旨在針對科技與智慧資本中相關議題作探討；其中包括知識管理、智慧資本管理、智財管理、及產業策略與智財之佈局規劃。除理論外，實務個案演練及講解，企業實地參訪及專家講座亦包含。
schedule:
W1 Course introduction
W2 The knowledge context
W3 An introduction to strategic knowledge management
W4 The knowledge leader
W5 Developing and sustaining a knowledge culture
W6 Supporting knowledge management through human resource management practices
W7 Supporting knowledge management through technology
W8 Knowledge applications
W9 Developing and managing knowledge repositories
W10 Midterm proposal/report (I)
W11 Midterm proposal/report (II)
W12 Developing an effective knowledge service
W13 Learning and development in a knowledge setting
W14 Evaluating the effectiveness of the knowledge strategy
W15 Sustainable knowledge management
W16 An overall view of strategic knowledge development
W17 Term project report (I)
W18 Term project report (II)
scorePolicy:
Class performance: 30%
Midterm proposal/report: 30%
Term project: 40%
materials:
1. Debowski, S. (2006). <i>Knowledge management</i>. John Wiley & Sons.
2. Awad, E., & Ghaziri, H. (2007). <i>Knowledge management</i>. Ting Lung Book Co.
